original_text: So all the cities for the children of Merari by their families, which were remaining of the families of the Levites, were by their lot twelve cities.
korean_text: 이는 레위 가족의 남은 자 곧 므라리 자손이 그들의 가족대로 받은 성읍이니 그들이 제비 뽑아 얻은 성읍이 열두 성읍이었더라

sentences.original_text: So all the cities for the children of Merari
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 므라리 자손을 위한 모든 성읍들은

sentences.original_text: which were remaining of the families of the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람의 가족 중에 남은 것들은

sentences.original_text: were by their lot twelve cities
